verses.1: Tua ciangin kikhopna inn sungah Jesu paikik a, tua lai ah a khut a lang khat a zaw mi khat na om hi.
verses.2: Jesu gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak nuam mi pawl khat tua lai ah om uh a, Sabbath ni-in hih mipa a damsak kha hiam, ci-in vil gige uh hi.
verses.3: Jesu in khut zaw mipa kiangah, “Hih a mai lamah hong ding in,” a ci hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin mite kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in bang i hih ding i Thukham in hong deih ahi hiam? Huh ding maw, gimsak ding; mi khat a nuntakna hot ding maw, thah ding; koi hong deih zaw ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Ahih hangin kuamah in dawng lo hi.
verses.5: Jesu in hehmai tawh a kiim a pam en kawikawi a, ahi zongin a khialhna uh le a thuphawk theih lohna uh hangin mite khasiathuai a sa zel hi. Tua ciangin a mipa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” a ci hi. Amah in zong a khut zan a, damin a ngeina bangkik hi.
verses.6: Tua ahih ciangin kikhopna inn panin Farisi mite pai khia-in Herod pawlte kim khat tawh kikhopna nei pah uh a, Jesu a thah theih nading uh a vaihawm uh hi.
verses.7: Tua lai panin Galilee Tuili ah Jesu le a nungzuite pai uh a, Galilee gam, Judea gam,
verses.8: Jerusalem khua, Idumia gam, Jordan gal khat, Taia khuapi kiim le Sidon khuapi kiim a om gamte in ama hih sa thute za khin uh ahih manin, hih gamte panin mihon tampi tak, ama kiangah hong pai uh hi.
verses.9: Mihonte tam lua mahmah ahih manin amaute in Jesu a nehcip gawp khak loh nadingin ama om nading gunkuang khat a koih nadingun a nungzuite a sawl hi.
verses.10: Amah in cina mi tampi damsak khin ahih manin, Jesu a lawn theih nadingun cina khempeuh in amah hong naih ciat uh hi.
verses.11: Tua laitakin miteʼ sunga lut dawite in Jesu a muh uh ciangin a mai ah pukin kiko uh a, “Nang pen Pasianʼ Tapa na hi hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.12: Dawite in amah kua mi ahi cihna thu a genkhiat loh nadingun Jesu in nakpi takin dawite a kham hi.
verses.13: Tua lai panin a mual tung lamah Jesu pai to a, mi a deih teng ama kiangah a sam hi. Tua a sap mite ama kiangah hong pai uh a,
verses.14: amah in mi sawm le nih teelin, sawltakte, ci-in min a phuah hi. Jesu in, “Kei tawh a kikhawl dingin no teng ka hong teel hi. Thu a hilh dingin zong ka hong sawl dinga,
verses.15: dawi hawlkhiat nading vangliatna na nei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.16: Tua a teel mi sawm le nihte: Simon (Jesu in a min thak dingin Peter a phuah pa),
verses.17: Zebediʼ tapa James le a naupa Johan (Jesu in hih unaute pen “Van ging bang,” a cihnopna Boanerges min a phuahte),
verses.18: Andru, Filip, Bartholomew, Matthai, Thomas, Alfeasʼ tapa James, Thaddeas, Simon (gam khual pa),
verses.19: le Jesu a lehhek Iskariotʼ tapa Judas ahi uh hi. Tua lai panin inn ah Jesu ciah a,
verses.20: ama kiangah mihonpi hong kikhawmkik zel ahih manin Jesu le a nungzuite in an nangawn ne thei lo uh hi.
verses.21: A innkuanpihte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu a la dingin hong kuan khia uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Jesu mihai suakta hi,” a kicihna thu a za uh hi.
verses.22: Jerusalem khua pan a hong pai Thukham hilh siate pawl khat in, “Hih pa sungah Beelzebul lut hi. Dawimangpa in ama tungah dawi hawlkhiat theih nading vangliatna pia hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.23: Tua ahih ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah mite samin thu gentehna tawh thu hilh a, “Satan in Satan bangci hawlkhiat theih ding ahi hiam?
verses.24: Gam khat peuhpeuh phel nih kisuahin kido le-uh tua gam kip lo ding hi.
verses.25: Innkuan khat peuhpeuh phel nih kisuahin kido le-uh tua innkuan kip zo lo ding hi.
verses.26: Satan le Satan kikhenin kido le-uh kip zo lo ding uh a, a bei ding uh hi ta uh hi.
verses.27: Mi thahatpa hencip masa lopi-in kuamah in mi thahatpaʼ inn sung pan a neihsate laksak zo lo ding hi. A hencip khit ciang bekin laksak zo pan bek ding hi.
verses.28: “Tua ahih ciangin hih thu phawk un! Mihingteʼ mawhna le a kampau siatnate uh kimaisak thei ding hi.
verses.29: Ahi zongin Kha Siangtho langpangin thu a gente in mawhna kip su kha uh ahih manin a mawhna uh kimaisak ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.30: (Mi pawl khatte in, “Jesu in dawi vei hi,” ci uh ahih manin hih bangin thu a gen ahi hi.)
verses.31: Tua laitakin a nu le a naute hong tung uh a, inn pua lamah ngakin, Jesu a sam dingin mi a sawl uh hi.
verses.32: Ama kiimah a tu mihonpite in, “Na nu le na naute, inn pua ah om uh a, nang hong sam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.33: Jesu in, “Ka nu le ka naute i cih kuate ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
verses.34: Ama kimkot ah a tu mite en a, “Hih lai ah ka nu le ka sanggamte om uh hi.
verses.35: Pasianʼ deihna bangin a gamta mi khempeuh ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
